title: The Chinese versions of Blizzard's games may have been shut down over a big misunderstanding
description: A New York Times report says the bad blood came to a boil over a perceived threat during a licensing negotiation.

title: Electronic Arts is laying off 6% of its workforce
description: Things are going really great at EA, so it's time to start firing people.

title: I got to see PUBG creator Brendan Greene's next project: a digital world the size of a real planet
description: Greene is building a virtual planet called Project Artemis to act as "a big emergent space," but he doesn't want to dictate what players do with it.

title: Nightdive reassures fans about the Atari deal: 'Not only will we be doing as much as we ever did, but we'll be doing more of it'
description: News of the buyout didn't go over very well with fans, but Nightdive and Atari both say they have shared goals in "innovative" retro gaming.

title: You can try Nexon's new tactical shooter for free this week
description: The final beta for the 5v5 shooter Veiled Experts kicks off at midnight tonight.

title: Finally, a game that lets us fight the human menace as goblins
description: Time to go goblin mode.

title: Tony Hawk almost put his name on a 'more technically difficult' skating sim before Activision called
description: What would gaming be like with no Tony Hawk's Pro Skater?

title: D&D is coming to Minecraft
description: The add-on includes a 10-hour adventure with customizable characters and 20-sided dice, and it's coming soon.

title: I'm happy that Diablo 4 is just a prettier Diablo 3
description: If it ain't broke, don't fix it.

title: Diablo 4's story is intriguing, but I wish it didn't keep killing the momentum
description: Don't talk to me, I'm looting.

title: Bloober Team wants you to know it never said Silent Hill 2 is done, no matter what Google Translate says
description: And it never said it'd sell 10 million copies of it, either.

title: More than a decade after the MCU conquered cinema, why haven't superheroes taken over games?
description: We should be in the middle of a superhero game renaissance, but it never arrived.

title: Tech luminaries including Musk and Wozniak beg AI pioneers to hit the brakes
description: Open letter calls for six month pause on the AI experiment.

title: Endless Dungeon wants you to play with friends but a lack of shared progression doesn't make it easy
description: Amplitude has developed the game with co-op in mind but is missing some crucial quality-of-life decisions.

title: Disney CEO axes metaverse unit and almost everyone in it, with another 6,950 cuts to go
description: Bob Iger once said the tech would democratise the internet, but apparently it's not right for Disney.

title: It took the original Resident Evil 4 a year to hit 3 million sales, but the remake has done it in 2 days
description: Our appetite for being chased by chainsaw-wielding maniacs has only grown.

title: How to find Blue Medallions in Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: Complete the Destroy the Blue Medallions requests by shooting these symbols.

title: Nvidia's RTX 4060 and 4060 Ti rumoured to launch in May and could struggle even at 1080p
description: Please, please tell us the rumoured specs for Nvidia's ever-GPUs aren't right...

title: The Last of Us' PC port is bad, but the bugs are great
description: I'm not saying the shoddy port was worth it, but I'm not NOT saying that, either.

title: Man caught obviously smuggling CPUs under his clothes
description: I heard under his shirt he has so many cores, like at least a ten pack.

title: Wordle hint and answer #648: Wednesday, March 29
description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #648 puzzle.
